transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji Mohammad Ali sahab baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir ji bas thoda sa samay rakhiyega do teen minute ke liye. Mera naam Prashant hai main IndiaMART office se baat kar raha hun senior manager. Kahan se? Actually sir abhi Prashant baat kar raha hun main IndiaMART office se senior manager. Haan boliye. Sir actually abhi do teen din pehle na aapke jo hai aapke relationship manager wo kisi services discussion ke liye aapko call kiya tha to us time pe aapne uthaya nahi baad me aapne call back kiya. Uske chakkar me wo utha nahi payi. Thoda sa late ho gaya tha. To jab bhi kisi client side se koi complaint sorry koi call jati hai aur hamara executive nahi utha pata hai aur immediately call back nahi karta to aapki taraf se complaint register ho jati hai automatically. Theek hai? Haan ji haan ji. To usi complaint ke regarding humne call kiya hai. Halaki Anju ne bhi call kiya tha aapko to us complaint pe sari cheeze discuss kar li gayi thi. Main ye keh raha tha ki aapka jo buyer ki call hoti hai uska response rate bahut hi kharab hai. Ek aad number aur kyun nahi add kar lete buyer ki call receive karne ke liye. Kewal aapka main dekhta raha hun ek number added hai sir buyer ki call receive karne ke liye.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sun raha hun.
Customer: Haan. To aapke alawa aapke paas do number nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi sir ek hi sim use karte hain.
Executive: Ek hi sim use karte hain? To company me koi aur hoga uska number add kar dijiye. At least buyer ki call aap tak pahunche. Jo aap add kiye hain. Add kaun karega to wo puchega na sir koi buyer call hi nahi karega na to kahan se pahunchega. Nahi pichle kuch mahino me aapki kuch calls miss bhi hui hai. Haan ji ek sirf ek call August me ek call miss hui thi April me teen call miss hui thi right. Baki services jo IndiaMART pe chal rahi hai wo aap hi handle karte hain ya fir kisi aur ko de rakha hai aapne handle karne ke liye? Nahi nahi khud chalate hain.
Executive: Aap khud hi dekhte hain? Haan ji. Achcha achcha achcha. To sir koi dikkat pareshani to nahi ho rahi hai services me? Nahi nahi abhi thoda busy hai isliye baat nahi kar pa raha hun apne manager se. Achcha theek hai. To main ye keh raha tha ki aapka ek automated complaint register hua tha. Main sirf ek permission le raha hun aap se jo aapka automated complaint register hua tha usko close kar diya jaye? Reject kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai close kar diya ja raha hai. Haan close. Baki services ke regarding koi bhi dikkat pareshani hoti hai to aapke account manager ka jo naam number photo rehta hai wo aapke application me rehta hai aap wahan se connect kar sakte hain unko ya fir unka number save kar sakte hain ya fir mere is number pe bhi directly connect kar sakte hain koi bhi issue hota hai right. I'll be ready to help you anytime. Theek hai? Okay okay. To dhanyavad. Thank you very much for your time sir have a nice day. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Low response rate to buyer calls.

- Only one number added for buyer calls.

- Customer is busy and unable to talk.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested adding more numbers.

- Agreed to close the automated complaint.

- Provided contact information for account manager.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, complaint, call
